R = [0,9,189,2889,38889,488889,5888889,68888889,788888889]

def process(N):
    for i in xrange(8,-1,-1):
        if  N >  R[i]:
            N -= R[i]
            if N % (i+1): return 'Impossible!'
            else:         return N / (i+1) + 10**i - 1

def main():
    while True:
        N = raw_input()
        if N == '#': break
        print process(int(N))

main()
